data.eml:eml: The ants of El Hierro (Canary Islands).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Espadaler, X. (2007): The ants of El Hierro (Canary Islands). In: Snelling, R. R., Fisher, B. L., Ward, P. S. (Eds): Advances in ant systematics (Hymenoptera: Formicidae): Homage to E. O. Wilson - 50 years of contributions. Memoirs of the American Entomological Institute, 80: 113-127, URL: http://plazi.org:8080/dspace/handle/10199/15379
